Jocelyn Montpert

CEO

Jocelyn is the founder of Trade Duty Refund (TDR) and a consultant in e-commerce supply chain

Key Skills and Expertise
  • Global E-Commerce: Jocelyn has a proven track record in global e-commerce, helping companies navigate the intricacies of cross-border trade.
  • Customer Returns: He has developed innovative solutions for managing customer returns, ensuring efficient and cost-effective processes.
  • Supply Chain Solutions: Jocelyn has designed and implemented comprehensive supply chain solutions for major global retailers, optimizing their logistics operations.
Geo Focus

During his career, Jocelyn has developped his network and experience in Europe, UK and North America.

Languages

Jocelyn is located in France and speaks 2 languages fluently: French and English.
